overview: The small Baltic Sea island is located in Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, just to the left of Rügen. Hiddensee's 19 square kilometres present a diverse beauty with rugged cliffs and snow-white sandy beaches. The mixture of charming landscape and almost meditative tranquillity has been attracting celebrities and artists here since the 1920s. Judith Rakers takes the viewers on a multifaceted itinerary across the small Baltic Sea island.
title: Hiddensee … mit Judith Rakers
